ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: What complete crap. I can t believe that is the reason cited. I think it is another example of Verant throwing the first available answer rather than doing any
ygData.messageBody:
What complete crap.

I can't believe that is the reason cited. I think it is another example of
Verant throwing the first available answer rather than doing any real
checking.

First off, the spell effects on ALL the other armor (except shaman) are
infinitely more useful in combat than the effects on our armor. Secondly, in
terms of whether AC matters to us bards the answer is unequivicably yes.
Anything that gets me bashed less is good. Even when I'm singing nothing but
clarity, I'm in the front line hacking at the mobs. As such, I tend to get
beat on quite a bit. Bards need AC, that's why we are a plate wearing class.

Draelon Stormsong
Bard of the Tribunal

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 7:22 PM
To: EQBards
Subject: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


I guess we should forward all of our issues directly to Baelish from here on
out. Still nothing on Lullaby though.

Galtin

http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=1511
